author: m.kalinin
content: The spec doesn't expect these checks to be done by the CL. It breaks down payload validation into 3 steps where each step is supposed to be performed by the EL (`execution_engine` in the spec)

author: sproul
content: Ohhh, right. That makes sense then. I didn't really look closely at the `self: ExecutionEngine` part

author: marcinds
content: Today I'm spamming devnet-12 with thousands of 1-blob txs, but this time there is only 1 tx per 1 account. At this point (23k txs sent from 23k accounts) Geth is missing many slots. Other ELs are fine. Attestations are fine as well (89%+). I will continue spamming, planning to send ~30-40k txs more. FYI <@206016661470314496> <@360491619402776577> <@211091239112671234>
